---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature for the project
title: "Epic: [Brief description of the feature]"
labels: enhancement, epic
assignees:

---

## Feature Request Process

### Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

### User Story
As a [user type], I want [feature] so that [benefit/value].

### Proposed Solution
A clear and concise description of how you think this feature should work.

### Benefits
Explain the benefits this feature would bring to the project/users.

### Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

### Additional Context
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.
